TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ParameterQueryRootExpression extends Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Query.QueryRootExpression

summary.para: An expression that represents a parameter query root within the query.
This type is typically used by database providers (and other extensions). It is generally not used in application code.
